summary: A series of strange murders take place in an European school of cinema and nobody, except the professors, seems to understand what's happening.
cast: Alberto Amarilla|Oona Chaplin|Leticia Dolera|Geraldine Chaplin|Francesco Carnelutti|Álex Angulo|Silvia De Santis|Jun Ichikawa|Kenji Kohashi|Paolo De Vita|Francesco Martino|Matteo Danese|Franco Pistoni|Anna Cuculo|Lorenzo Pedrotti|Fabiola Palmas|Hairi Vogel|Andrea Montuschi|Gioele Calorio|Alessia Cardella|Carolina Tatò
keywords: eyeballs|eyes gouged out|eyes wide open|evil photography|evil art
title: Imago Mortis
